p: When compared by their cultural importance, as expressed in the CI index, Cleidion javanicum, Tinospora crispa, and Litsea cubeba were the most commonly used for treatments related to infectious diseases in various categories. In a previous study of Thai medicinal plants in general, Tinospora crispa, Cleidion javanicum, and Litsea cubeba were also ranked among the top species among 2187 with the highest Species Use Value (UV) [ 15].
